Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning of Miyazawa Kenji's life, which includes his agriculture and experimental agricultural policies; and the middle through the end of his life, which includes his poems and publications up to his death. I had mixed feelings for "Les Valseuses" (1974) written and directed by Bertrand Blier when I started watching it but I ended up loving it. "Les Valseuses" was remade as "Hardcore" (1990) by Paul Verhoven starring George Dzundza, Michele Hicks, and Michael Love. "Les Valseuses" is the story of love found and lost and love that never even had a chance.
